column4: Hi, I just set up a server and I'm trying to find or set up my access log files. How do I do that?
in general, $dkpg -L <package-name> will show you the files installed by a package, so do that for the server you installed, and find the log file's location
- I should have been more specific - I'm looking for Apache log files and I'm not sure where they go - I know where the installed files are
they will be in /var/log/ (httpd or apache2 or apache)
